name: Gilles Barthe [SP]
content: Gilles Barthe Gilles Barthe I am scientific director at Max Planck Institute for Security and Privacy, Bochum, Germany and (part-time) research professor at IMDEA Software Institute, Madrid, Spain. My research interests include programming languages and program verification, security, privacy, and cryptography. Projects Formosa Publications DBLP Contact Email: firstname.lastname@mpi-sp.org address: MPI-SP, Universitaetsstr. 140, 44799 Bochum, Germany
